features: One-Button Deformation:This remote control robot car is 2-in-1 model car toy, and can be changed from car to robot with one button click, which transforms back and forth easily to have a great fun

360° Rotation & One-Click Demo:With a flexible drifting wheel on the bottom , this robot racing car can finish 360 degree rotation in both car and robot model flexibly, and kids can enjoy great fun with auto demo function.

Robust 2.4G Remote Control: With strong 2.4Ghz transmitter system, kids can easily control the robot car toy within 45 meters, and this RC model car is simple to operate for children with controller, forward, backward, turn right, turn left, one button deformation and one click auto demo

High-quality Materials:This deformation robot car for kids is made of sturdy and non-toxic ABS plastic material, which is collision resistant and environmental-friendly, ensuing your kids have a lasting and happy entertainment
Perfect Gift for Kids:With aerodynamic design and scratch-resistant materials, this gift toy car is easy to operate and ideal for kids’ birthday, Christmas or other festivals.
body.description: Warm Tips: 1.Please prepare 5*1.5 V AA batteries to operate the car for great fun. 2.Kids should under adult supervision for safety when playing the robot car . 3.Please take out the battery when the car not in use for a long time. 4.This car is mainly suitable for indoor floor, not suitable for outdoor grassland,stone roads or other rugged roads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect Gift for Your Kids! Desuccus RC robot car is perfectly designed for kids, which has wonderful design and cool features, suitable for Christmas, Birthday and other festival gifts.

1:18 Scale Toy Car 2.4G Remote Control With Strong 2.4 GHz remote control, you can easily control this racing toy car within 45 meters to have a great indoor fun, and kids can race with friends without worrying about mutual interference. 360 Degree Rotation With 360 degree rotation roller on the bottom, this deforming remote control car can move forward, backward, turn right or turn left flexibly, so kids can enjoy great entertainment with this cool design. One-Button Deformation It's so amazing that the rc racing car can transform from car to robot automatically within a second just by pressing the one-key deformation button.

Warm Tips: 1.Please prepare 5*1.5 V AA batteries to operate the car for great fun. 2.Kids should under adult supervision for safety when playing the robot car . 3.Please take out the battery when the car not in use for a long time. 4.This car is mainly suitable for indoor floor, not suitable for outdoor grassland,stone roads or other rugged roads. Packing List 1*Remote Control Car 1*Remote Controller 1*User Manual 1*Screwdriver

Enjoy Your Time with Kids Fantastic Design This wonderful robot racing car has many cool design for fun, such as rotation roller and led light on the bottom, which give kids better playing experience, and easy to operate with the on/off switch Robust Materials This robot car toy is made of high quality non-toxic, scratch-resistant ABS plastic materials, which ensure that kids can enjoy their time safely and lasting. Gifts for Kids With exquisite package and well performance, this toy car is a good gift for kids over 3 years, which is also a good choice for Christmas , Birthday or other festivals to enhance relationship between parents and kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Thrilling Dual-Mode Delight for Kids
reviews.reviewText: The Desuccus Remote Control Car has taken playtime to a whole new level in our household, delivering an exhilarating combination of a high-speed racing car and a captivating transforming robot. As a parent, I couldn't be more impressed with the innovative design and endless entertainment this 2-in-1 toy provides for kids.The 1:18 scale model boasts a sleek racing car design that immediately catches the eye. The attention to detail is commendable, and the build quality is sturdy enough to withstand the energetic play of kids. The 2.4Ghz remote control ensures a reliable connection, allowing for smooth and responsive maneuvers.The real magic happens with the one-button deformation feature. Watching the car seamlessly transform into a robot adds an element of excitement and surprise, capturing the imagination of kids and igniting their creativity. The transformation is quick and smooth, adding a dynamic element to playtime.The 360° drifting capability is a showstopper. The car's agile movements and ability to perform spins and drifts contribute to an adrenaline-packed experience. The controls are intuitive, making it easy for kids to master the car's movements and transformations.This toy isn't just about fun; it also encourages imaginative play and storytelling. The combination of a racing car and a robot opens up a world of possibilities for creative adventures. It's a fantastic way for kids to develop cognitive skills while having a blast.The Desuccus Transform Robot RC Car makes for an impressive gift for both boys and girls. The dual-mode functionality ensures that it appeals to a wide age range, providing long-lasting entertainment. The durability of the materials used in construction adds to the toy's overall value.In summary, the Desuccus Remote Control Car exceeds expectations as a versatile and thrilling toy. It seamlessly combines the excitement of a racing car with the intrigue of a transforming robot, making it a standout in the world of remote control toys. With its durability, innovation, and endless play possibilities, this toy earns a well-deserved five-star rating. Highly recommended for kids who love action-packed play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome remote control car. It transforms from the remote.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my grandson for Christmas. He loved it! I was very impressed it, it did best on the tile floors. He is nine years old and handled the car like a pro. It transforms from the remote and that is quite impressive and then back to the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product very flimsy, fragile to the touch makes me wonder how long it will last in the hands of a 5 year old. On the other hand, it operates as advertised, remote control easy to handle, simple design. It does not talk or emits any sounds which leaves a little wish for however runs, gyrates, converts to and from car-robot flawlessly. Good buy after all for the price. BTW, it came fast and in good condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I grabbed these on sale (and would not suggest paying full price) and would say the sale price was 100% worth it. I bought 3 for 3 kids ages 4, 6, and 8 and all 3 have been over the moon with them. They're easy to set up and use and while a tad flimsy the kids haven't broken them yet and that's a big deal. Generally speaking, they're really neat and at a sale price totally worth it. I've already sent the link to several people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 year old birthday gift!
reviews.reviewText: Our grandson turned 5 so we got him this.He was playing with it all morning.Good gift for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You have to remove batteries to cut off
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. EVERYTIME you are done playing with it you have to take out both sets of batteries to cut it off there is no switch. The car does not have reverse so you have to go get it every time it goes against something. It doesn't stand up all the way as a transformer & it doesn't close back down all the way to make a car. It doesn't deserve 1 star but it's as low as you can go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a little smaller than expected and one of the side doors are sticky but it is overall an amazing toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nephew loves this toy
reviews.reviewText: 6 year old nephew loved this toy. It’s held up well.
